member.name: M:Cqrs.Azure.WebJobs.CqrsJobHost`1.StartHost
member.remarks: Please set the following connection strings in app.config for this WebJob to run: AzureWebJobsDashboard and AzureWebJobsStorage Better yet, add them to your Azure portal so they can be changed at runtime without re-deploying or re-compiling.
